# The Everything Formula
"**Tupper's self-referential formula** is a formula defined by Jeff Tupper that, when graphed in two dimensions at a very specific location in the plane, can be "programmed" to visually reproduce the formula itself."

Read more:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tupper%27s_self-referential_formula

Great video by Numberphile: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_s5RFgd59ao


## Try it out
